articles.title: New Zealand designates American Proud Boys and The Base terrorist organisations - RNZ
articles.description: The Proud Boys and The Base meet the definition of terrorist entities, and the move will mean funding, supporting or organising with them will be illegal, Andrew Coster says.
articles.content:
New Zealand has designated US groups the Proud Boys and The Base as terrorist entities.

articles.title: Woody Williams, America's last World War II Medal of Honor recipient, dies - Fox News
articles.description: Hershel "Woody" Williams, 98, passed away while surrounded by his family on Wednesday. He was America's last surviving Medal of Honor recipient from World War II.
articles.content:
Hershel "Woody" Williams, America's last surviving World War II veteran to have received a Medal of Honor, passed away surrounded by family on Wednesday morning.

articles.title: Gorsuch fumes after Supreme Court strips tribal authority in Oklahoma - Business Insider

articles.content:
